CustomField.description: The default timeout value in hours for preferred agent expiry. This value is used for AP cases if no routing rule is matched. If matching routing rule is found the preferred agent timeout configured in the matching routing rule is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default timeout value in hours for AP cases preferred agent expiry. This value is used for AP cases if no routing rule is matched.
CustomField.label: Default Preferred Agent Expiry(In Hours)
